title: server connection issues?
body: So  sometime last night it started but it was hardly noticeable but my MS has started to spike over 100 anything going on with riots servers? and i know other people are having the same issues i just got out of a game and 2 other players where effected by it

replies.body: I was having same issues yesterday with some teammates but ping is back to normal today.

Are these spikes random or for the entire duration of the match?  It sounds like you could be experiencing issues holding comms with our game server, so it could be something like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure.  Let me know what you find!

they where random but would happen on occasion through out the match but it would be like increasing like it would spike to 140+ ms then go back down to 30 or at one point it was attempting to reconnect and that has not happend for a very long time
